title: Add component to selected glyphs at offset
description: Adds a named component (e.g. acute) to the current layer of each selected glyph at an x,y offset.
code:
component_name = 'acute'
ox, oy = 0, 120
for sl in font.selectedLayers:
	c = GSComponent(component_name)
	c.position = (ox, oy)
	sl.components.append(c)
